title: Denise Lewis on resilience, dealing with critics, and success
description:
Olympic champion heptathlete Denise Lewis is joined by Bridgestone ambassador, and friend, Daley Thompson for an in depth chat.

Daley is joining the podcast as co-host for a special series of four episodes. One athlete from each decade, the 80s, 90s, 2000s, and 2010s.

Denise talks about her battle against serious injury to win gold in 2000, her mental struggles with the British media before 2004, and how she chases her dreams, no matter what.

The Olympic Channel Podcast is brought to you by Bridgestone - Worldwide Olympic and Paralympic partner.

Head to olympicchannel.com/podcast for more information.
